item.title: Hvordan klarer de politiske partier sig på Facebook?
item.description: På de respektive facebook-sider kan vi naturligvis også finde antallet af følgere - dem gemmer vi også lige, da vi skal bruge dem senere. Vi har altså en del data på hvert post - hvornår den er afsendt, hvilken type post (video, tekst, billede) samt hvor mange likes, kommentarer og delinger der…

item.title: Combining R and Python for data analysis
item.description: The main drawback of doing it this way is that I am losing on the interactive explorative tools included in HyperSpy. For this reason my workflow has been to interactively explore and develop the Python code in a Jupyter Notebook, and then copy the final script to a Python chunk in an R Markdown…

item.title: Open Science tools for our research group
item.description: I have been considering how to apply this thinking to our research. I am confident that it could be made more efficient and well-documented if R was adopted as a general tool for data…
